Author: fuuwuu
Text: you are so much more self aware than i was at your age, which is great! the road to being at peace with your mind and body is tough but the sooner you start challenging ED thoughts the better.   like you said, it won't happen immediately but any effort towards cultivating a forgiving mindset for yourself is worthwhile. i believe in you!

Author: shes_toast
Text: Hey, that shit's a battle. Don't be too hard on yourself for feeling you've "wasted time" or not being able to snap your fingers and fix your mindsetâ€”sometimes one day at a time if a good start. You know this is bullshit and you deserve a good life. See if you can act on those feelings; you deserve it!
